Text.Page: Elleon gave you vital intelligence on how to enter Thulsa's Stronghold, the Ebon Tower. Elleon's way required a special keystone: a gem belonging to Killian, the god of terror. Elleon and Jelena accompanied you to the Labyrinth of Terror, where Elleon intercepted a blast of magic meant for you—perhaps at the cost of his life....

—it looks like we'll be fighting side by side once again. Thulsa and Killian awakened Kelsaik, but you kept them from obtaining complete control.

Kelsaik must be near Thulsa...which is worrisome, but it gives us an opportunity. Jelena and I know where Thulsa is: Vale of Spires, Lorcada.

Let's talk in person. I'll see you at the blacksmith's workshop.

Elleon

Long time no see, .

Thulsa, Killian, and now Kelsaik. We have a knack for attracting powerful enemies, don't we?

Ever heard of an ancient stronghold called the Ebon Tower?

Well, Thulsa is there...maybe Kelsaik, too. But Thulsa has had only one visitor. Guess who?"Killian?"

Exactly! We need the gem on Killian's staff, or we can't get into the Ebon Tower.

And it's not gonna break my heart to take the gem off Killian's corpse.

So Killian first, then. He's in the Labyrinth of Terror. I will be your guide.
We just broke the seal, and Jelena went in first. Let's go!

I can't let Elleon die. I just can't!

I know Elleon would want me to leave him and go with you, but he's in no position to argue. I feel horrible, though..."It's okay. I got this."
I know you do, <PCNAME>. I'll be back in Habere, and I want all the details. So go kill a god already!
(You find an unpleasant message. "Discover this place and feel the joy of agony.")
You have extracted the gem that will get you in to the Ebon Tower.

If you're alive, then...yes! Yes! Yes!

Elleon? Alive, but hanging by a thread. Still, he's Elleon, right? That should count for something."He'll be fine. Trust me."
Elleon and I are out of commission for the time being, though. Give our "best" to Kelsaik, will ya?
